meanings.definition: Grasses used for lawns or sports fields.
meanings.sent1: The turfgrasses in the park are always so green and soft.
meanings.sent2: The soccer field was lush with healthy turfgrasses.
meanings.sent3: The turfgrasses whispered secrets to each other in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a field of turfgrasses, each thought a blade swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly cut turfgrasses filled the air, bringing back memories of childhood games.

meanings.definition: The area covered by such grasses.
meanings.sent1: The backyard was a vast expanse of vibrant turfgrasses.
meanings.sent2: The golf course had acres of perfectly manicured turfgrasses.
meanings.sent3: The turfgrasses seemed to be playing hide and seek with the lawnmower.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a field of turfgrasses, each blade representing a different emotion.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the rolling hills covered in turfgrasses took her breath away.
